metadata.title: CVE-2014-3121 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
rxvt-unicode before 9.20 does not properly handle OSC escape sequences,which allows user-assisted remote attackers to manipulate arbitrary Xwindow properties and execute arbitrary commands.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3121` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rxvt-unicode - 9.20-1
rxvt-unicode-256color - 9.20-1
rxvt-unicode-lite - 9.20-1
rxvt-unicode-ml - 9.20-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rxvt-unicode package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.20-1').
